-	shop	TD01	-1,607:250000,608:150000,523:5000,645:5000,656:5000,657:5000,14509:5000,14510:5000,662:75000,12017:100000,12016:120000,12020:200000,606:250000,678:300000
-	shop	TD02	-1,7136:2500,7135:2500,7137:5000,7138:5000,1092:5000,7134:5000,1093:5000,717:5000,716:5000,715:5000,1010:5000,1011:5000,1003:5000,1002:5000,998:5000,999:5000,1000:120000,7139:250000,985:300000,984:300000

-	shop	TD11	-1,1766:50,1755:20,1750:10,1754:20,1761:20,1752:20,1760:20,1759:20,1772:100,1757:30,1770:20,1769:30,1765:40,1763:30,1762:30,1767:30,1764:30,1751:20,1768:30,1753:30,1756:30,1758:30,1771:1000
-	shop	TD12	-1,13200:50,13202:100,13201:300,13206:500,13203:500,13207:500,13204:500,13205:500
-	shop	TD13	-1,7522:500,7521:500,7523:500,13252:50,13254:500,13251:100,13253:300,13250:50,13256:50,13259:50,13258:50,13255:50,13257:50



-	shop	Sell1	-1,909:-1



celestial,130,160,5	script	Sari Sari Store	726,{

	set .@Shop1$, "Useable Item:Miscellaneous:Scroll Item:Sell Item";

	switch ( select(.@Shop1$)) { 
		case 1:
			callshop "TD01",1;
			end;
		case 2:
			callshop "TD02",1;
			end;
		case 3:
			callshop "TD03",1;
			end;
		case 4:
			callshop "Sell1",2;
			end;


	}
}

celestial,130,157,5	script	Ammunition#1	732,{

	set .@Shop2$, "Arrow:Bullet:Shuriken & Kunai:Sell Item";

	switch ( select(.@Shop2$)) { 
		case 1:
			callshop "TD11",1;
			end;
		case 2:
			callshop "TD12",1;
			end;
		case 3:
			callshop "TD13",1;
			end;
		case 4:
			callshop "Sell1",2;
			end;

	}
}
